mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOG_VISIT(LV_IP, LV_COUNTRY, LV_DATE, LV_BROWSER) VALUES (#{lv_ip}, #{lv_country}, SYSDATE, #{lv_browser})
INSERT INTO LOG_LOGIN(LL_ID, LL_IP, LL_COUNTRY, LL_DATE, LL_DEVICE, LL_RESULT) VALUES (#{ll_id}, #{ll_ip}, #{ll_country}, SYSDATE, #{ll_device}, #{ll_result})
mapper.select: SELECT M.M_ID, M.M_NAME, M.M_PHONE, M.M_GENDER, M.M_BIRTHDAY, M.M_REGDATE, M.M_ADDRESS, P.P_HOBBY, P.P_LANGUAGE, P.P_JOB, P.P_ABOUTME, P.P_PURPOSE,P.P_VISITCOUNTRY, PI.P_ROUTE FROM MEMBER M, PROFILE_IMAGE PI, PROFILE P WHERE M.M_ID = PI.M_ID AND PI.M_ID = P.M_ID AND PI.P_MAIN = '1' AND M.M_ID = #{m_id}
SELECT L.*, PI.P_ROUTE FROM LOCALADVICE L, PROFILE_IMAGE PI WHERE L.M_ID = PI.M_ID AND L.M_ID = #{m_id} AND PI.P_MAIN = 1 ORDER BY L.L_DATE DESC
SELECT LC.LC_IDX, LC.L_IDX, LC.M_ID, LC.LC_DATE, LC.LC_CONTENT, LC.DETDET, PI.P_ROUTE FROM L_COMMENT LC, PROFILE_IMAGE PI WHERE LC.M_ID = PI.M_ID AND PI.P_MAIN = 1 AND LC.M_ID = #{m_id}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) AS M_CNT FROM MEMBER) M, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS L_CNT FROM LOCALADVICE) L, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS LC_CNT FROM L_COMMENT) LC, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS RH_CNT FROM HOST WHERE H_ENDDATE >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) RH, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS H_CNT FROM HOST) H, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS RT_CNT FROM TRAVELERS WHERE T_ENDDATE >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) RT, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS T_CNT FROM TRAVELERS) T, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS MSG_CNT FROM MESSAGE) MSG, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS E_CNT FROM EVENT) E, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS EC_CNT FROM EVENT_COMMENT) EC, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS LOG_L_CNT FROM LOG_LOGIN) L_LC, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS LOG_V_CNT FROM LOG_VISIT) L_VC
SELECT E_IDX, E_ADDRESS, E_NAME, E_CONTENT, E_STARTDATE, E_ENDDATE, E_UPVOTE, E_REVIEWCOUNT, LAT, LNG, E_REGION, E_TAG, E_COUNT FROM EVENT WHERE E_ENDDATE >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EVENT (E_IDX, E_NAME, E_CONTENT, E_ADDRESS, E_STARTDATE, E_ENDDATE, LAT, LNG, E_REGION, E_TAG, E_DATE) VALUES (EVENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{e_name}, #{e_content}, #{e_address}, #{e_startdate}, #{e_enddate}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{e_region}, #{e_tag}, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO EVENT_IMAGE (E_IDX, E_IMG, E_MAIN) VALUES (EVENT_SEQ.CURRVAL, #{e_img}, #{e_main})
